bug.author: supertetelman
bug.summary: Kubeflow v0.7.0 kfctl delete does not clean up all resources
bug.description:
Similar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3767>#3767</denchmark-link> , in the newest release (v0.7.0) when I issue a delete command I am still seeing namespaces left behind for , , , and most of the time is getting stuck in a terminating state. I also see some CRD left behind. I am running this on a freshly installed on-prem K8S v1.15 installed via Kubespray with rook-ceph installed as the storage. Following all the steps listed here for install and deletion: <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/k8s/kfctl-k8s-istio/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/k8s/kfctl-k8s-istio/</denchmark-link>
Namely: <denchmark-code>export CONFIG_FILE=${KF_DIR}/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.7.0.yaml kfctl delete -f ${CONFIG_FILE} --delete_storage </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.86. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Issue still exists in kfctl v1.0-rc.1
It also exists in kfctl v1.0-0-g94c35cf.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
I'm still having some issues with error evaluating kustomization manifest for cert-manager, but for the most part the new deletion logic is working well and this issue is resolved as of v1.1 rc-1.
